channel.title: Data Analytics Portfolio by Sampath Raj Pothula
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analytics Portfolio by Sampath Raj Pothula

item.title: Technology Budget Allocation Analysis
item.description: Analyzed technology budget allocation survey data from Infosys, creating insightful Power BI visualizations. This project involved evaluating resource distribution and identifying optimization opportunities.

item.title: Coffee Pricing Experiment Analysis
item.description: Analyzed a coffee pricing experiment by Iris Coffee to assess the impact of price changes on sales and profits. Used statistical methods and Power BI to guide pricing strategy decisions.

item.title: Commercial Analytics at Exide Industries
item.description: Developed dashboards and reports for sales analysis using SQL, Power BI, and Excel. Focused on data-driven insights to improve business performance and resource allocation.

item.title: Contact
